phase.description: Phase a simple, high-level summary of where the workflow is in its lifecycle.

startedAt.description: Time at which this workflow started.

finishedAt.description: Time at which this workflow completed.

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about why the workflow is in this condition.

compressedNodes.description: Compressed and base64 decoded Nodes map.

nodes.description: Nodes is a mapping between a node ID and the node's status.

persistentVolumeClaims.description: PersistentVolumeClaims tracks all PVCs that were created as part of the workflow.

outputs.description: Outputs captures output values and artifact locations produced by the workflow via global outputs.
